formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: S_{MS} = F_a S_s,\quad S_{M1} = F_v S_1,\quad S_{DS} = \tfrac{2}{3}\,S_{MS},\quad S_{D1} = \tfrac{2}{3}\,S_{M1}
formulas.raw: S_{MS} = F_a S_s,\quad S_{M1} = F_v S_1,\quad S_{DS} = \tfrac{2}{3}\,S_{MS},\quad S_{D1} = \tfrac{2}{3}\,S_{M1}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: C_s = \min\!\left( \frac{S_{DS}}{R/I_e},\; \begin{cases} \dfrac{S_{D1}}{T\,(R/I_e)}, & T \le T_L \\\\ \dfrac{S_{D1}\,T_L}{T^2\,(R/I_e)}, & T > T_L \end{cases} \right), \qquad V = C_s\,W
formulas.raw: C_s = \min\!\left( \frac{S_{DS}}{R/I_e},\; \begin{cases} \dfrac{S_{D1}}{T\,(R/I_e)}, & T \le T_L \\\\ \dfrac{S_{D1}\,T_L}{T^2\,(R/I_e)}, & T > T_L \end{cases} \right), \qquad V = C_s\,W

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Design spectra: $$ S_{MS} = F_a S_s,\quad S_{M1} = F_v S_1,\quad S_{DS} = \tfrac{2}{3}\,S_{MS},\quad S_{D1} = \tfrac{2}{3}\,S_{M1} $$ Response coefficient and base shear: $$ C_s = \min\!\left( \frac{S_{DS}}{R/I_e},\; \begin{cases} \dfrac{S_{D1}}{T\,(R/I_e)}, & T \le T_L \\\\ \dfrac{S_{D1}\,T_L}{T^2\,(R/I_e)}, & T > T_L \end{cases} \right), \qquad V = C_s\,W $$ Minimums: $$ C_s \ge \max\!\left(0.01,\; 0.044\,S_{DS}\,I_e,\; \mathbb{1}_{S_1\ge 0.6}\cdot \frac{0.5\,S_1}{(R/I_e)}\right) $$

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
